column2: BRIEF-Ameriprise Financial Says CEO James Cracchiolo's FY 2019 Total Compensation Was $24.5 Mln- SEC Filing March 20 (Reuters) - Ameriprise Financial Inc: * AMERIPRISE FINANCIAL INC SAYS CEO JAMES CRACCHIOLO’S FY 2019 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $24.5 MILLION VERSUS $25.7 MILLION IN FY 2018 - SEC FILING * AMERIPRISE FINANCIAL INC SAYS CFO WALTER BERMAN’S FY 2019 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $9.6 MILLION VERSUS $10.1 MILLION IN FY 2018 * AMERIPRISE FINANCIAL INC SAYS FOR 2019, RATIO OF CEO’S ANNUAL TOTAL COMPENSATION TO ANNUAL TOTAL COMPENSATION OF MEDIAN EMPLOYEE WAS 230:1 Source : (bit.ly/2QxaOH9) Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Ameriprise Financial Q1 Adjusted Operating Earnings Per Share $3.70 April 23 (Reuters) - Ameriprise Financial Inc: * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $3.46 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * TOTAL ASSETS UNDER MANAGEMENT AND ADMINISTRATION AT QUARTER END INCREASED 9 PERCENT TO $887 BILLION * REGULAR QUARTERLY DIVIDEND RAISED 8 PERCENT TO $0.90 PER DILUTED SHARE * Q1 REVENUE VIEW $3.08 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
